SELECT dp.*, u.loginName,c.plateNo,f.fleetName FROM t_archives_dispatcher_plateNo dp LEFT JOIN t_system_user u ON u.id = dp.userId LEFT JOIN t_archives_car c ON c.id = dp.plateNoId LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON f.id = dp.fleetId
WHERE 1=1
AND userId = '${userId}'
AND dp.fleetId =#{fleetId}
